original_text: And Shaphan the secretary came to the king, and reported to the king, “Your servants have emptied out the money that was found in the house and have delivered it into the hand of the workmen who have the oversight of the house of the Lord.”
korean_text: 서기관 사반이 왕에게 돌아가서 보고하여 이르되 왕의 신복들이 성전에서 찾아낸 돈을 쏟아 여호와의 성전을 맡은 감독자의 손에 맡겼나이다 하고

sentences.original_text: And Shaphan the secretary came to the king,
“Your servants have emptied out the money
that was found in the house
into the hand of the workmen who have the oversight of the house of the Lord.”
